Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
Project.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
The ProjectController class provides methods to manage BTO projects in the system. It handles CRUD operations, filtering, and project status updates related to managers, officers, and applicants.

    • getFilteredProjectsByManager

      public static List<Project> getFilteredProjectsByManager(String managerID, Predicate<Project> Filter)
      Retrieves a list of projects created by a specific manager, optionally filtered by a given condition.
      Parameters:
      managerID - the ID of the manager whose projects are to be retrieved
      Filter - a Predicate to filter the projects; if null, all projects created by the manager are returned
      Returns:
      a list of filtered Project objects created by the specified manager

    • getProjectsForApplicant

      public static <T extends IUserProfile> List<Project> getProjectsForApplicant(T applicant)
      Gets a list of projects eligible for viewing or application by the applicant, based on age, marital status, and previous application/registration.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant (implements IUserProfile)
      Returns:
      list of eligible projects

    • getFilteredProjectsForApplicant

      public static <T extends IUserProfile> List<Project> getFilteredProjectsForApplicant(T Applicant, Predicate<Project> Filter)
      Filters a list of applicant-eligible projects based on custom predicate.
      Parameters:
      Applicant - the applicant
      Filter - predicate to apply for filtering
      Returns:
      filtered project list

    • getFilteredProjectsForRegistration

      officer - the officer
      Filter - optional predicate filter
      Returns:
      filtered project list

      Returns:

    • getProjectsByIDs

      public static List<Project> getProjectsByIDs(List<String> projectIds)
      Retrieves a list of projects based on a list of project IDs. Skips any IDs that do not correspond to an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectIds - the list of project IDs to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of Project objects corresponding to the given IDs
